trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: XML 형식의 서비스 메타 데이터의 직렬화 가능 컬렉션을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSet class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: MetadataSet 클래스의 컬렉션을 포함 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>개체를 각각 포함 하는 XML 형식의 메타 데이터 언어 하나.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the MetadataSet class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.
trans-unit.target: MetadataSet 클래스는 XML 메타 데이터 문서 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>등 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> 개체</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> 의 그룹을 전달 하는 데 사용 되는 일반적으로,

trans-unit.source: To create a MetadataSet from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: MetadataSet 만들려면는 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>형식의 개체 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 가져올 수는 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>형식의 개체 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a MetadataSet from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
trans-unit.target: 또한 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>는 MetadataSet XML 데이터에서 로드 하는 메서드 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A>메서드가 내부 메타 데이터를 XML 형식으로 작성할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
trans-unit.target: 이 형식은 Ws-metadataexchange 사양에 정의 된 구조를 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: 원본 또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>개체입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class that contains the specified collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> 의 지정 된 컬렉션을 포함 하는 클래스 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>에서 `sections`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The metadata values that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> is to contain.
trans-unit.target: 메타 데이터 값은 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> 포함 하는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> 의 serialize 된 형식으로 표시 되는 개체는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> 의 serialize 된 형식으로 표시 되는 개체는 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> 메타 데이터를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> 메타 데이터를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> 지정 된 위치에서 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 만듭니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>에서 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The reader to read in XML.
trans-unit.target: 읽을 xml에서 판독기입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> XML 스트림에 있는 모든 메타 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 판독기가 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*> method to provide serialization support.
trans-unit.target: 구현 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>serialization 지원을 제공 하기 위해 메서드.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>입니다.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> 반환

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> method and accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>의해 생성 되는 개체의 XML 표현을 설명 하는 개체는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> 메서드에서 액세스는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> 메서드.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method to support deserialization from XML.
trans-unit.target: 구현 된 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>XML 로부터의 deserialization을 지원 하기 위해 메서드에.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>

trans-unit.source: The reader to use when reading XML.
trans-unit.target: XML을 읽을 때 사용할 판독기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 판독기가 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method to support serialization to XML.
trans-unit.target: 구현 된 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>XML로의 serialization을 지원 하기 위해 메서드에.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use when writing XML.
trans-unit.target: XML을 쓸 때 사용할 기록기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 작성기가 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: 작성 한 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>XML 스트림으로.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.target: XML을 쓰는 데 사용할 기록기입니다.
